Detailed Description

A physic Actor use a modifed KinematicCharacterController taken in the bullet forum.

void OEngine::Physic::PhysicActor::setVerticalVelocity ( float  z  ) 
void OEngine::Physic::PhysicActor::setWalkDirection ( const btVector3 &  mvt  ) 

This function set the walkDirection. This is not relative to the actor orientation. I think it's also needed to take time into account. A typical call should look like this: setWalkDirection( mvt * orientation * dt)

std::string OEngine::Physic::PhysicActor::mName
btVector3 OEngine::Physic::PhysicActor::mTranslation

NPC scenenode is located on there feet, and you can't simply translate a btShape, so this vector is used each time get/setposition is called.
